E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 5/27/1988
Subject: Extension?
Dear Sir,
I am really enjoying playing for your team.
I would be interested in a contract extension!
How about you?

Regards,
Jack Clark

Date: Friday, 6/13/1988
Subject: Well...
I am rather upset that I do not play regularly.
I wish to be traded if that doesn't change!

Regards,
Lyman Bostock



Date: Thursday, 6/19/1988
Subject: Progress of Milt Hill
Dear Sir,
Milt Hill has nothing more to prove at A Kenosha Twins!
He has an ERA of 2.82 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 7/9/1988
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Alan Trammell



Date: Saturday, 7/19/1988
Subject: Victor Cruz is sick...
Diagnosis: Stomach Flu.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take 6 days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Monday, 9/1/1988
Subject: Progress of John Wehner
Dear Sir,
John Wehner is hitting the ball well at A Kenosha Twins!
He has an AVG of .314, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 9/8/1988
Subject: Progress of Milt Cuyler
Dear Sir,
Milt Cuyler has an AVG of .289 at AA Orlando Twins!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director
